test.name: Scenario: Verify display of error messages upon submitting null data in contact page

kw.name: Given I am in Jupiter Toys Homepage
Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: I open browser and navigate to URL
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: When I go to Contact page
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
